TopicTitle: The trash can full O boom![0.16-0.17Stock+Modded]

Articles.Content:
Hi, this is where i will be posting random craft i make.

First up:

(OUTDATED/ONLY FOR 0.16)

Class "C" bomber.

Mods: Jellycubes adv. modular missles, Jellycubes Bicopular, Rocketco Soyuz (asas)

Pic:

Desc: this is a general fighter/bomber. includes ejection system. handles well. use precison controls (CAPS) to fly. VERY stable.

(pulls up at 170 m/s around the end of the rwy with precison controls)

Jebs battlecruiser

Mods: SUNBEAM laser, Cart mod.

Pic:

Desc: Its a battlecruiser. make sure to disable steering on the center and back cart for it to work. even with the classs C bomber ramming it, (50 m/s) it can still survive:

Thank you for visiting, have a very kerbal day.

NEW IN 0.17:

IRS

This is a general, STOCK lander that can make it to any of the planets execpt jool for a base setup.

X-1 XRAY

A general, spaceplane. Features exploding canards for partys.

INTRODUCING:

THE JEBS BATTLECRUISER 2!

After mutch work, we improved the battlecruiser!

Requires: Dammned robotics, Modular wheels, Jelly cubes missles and railguns, SUNBEAM laser. [0.17]

Dl: [ATTACH]34045[/ATTACH]

.Craft's: [ATTACH]33068[/ATTACH][ATTACH]33067[/ATTACH][ATTACH]33352[/ATTACH][ATTACH]33355[/ATTACH]

Not much yet, but i have "cleaned up" the post now.

Cleaning up

Only the beautiful people get comments on the Spacecraft Exchange.

Nice warmachines, btw.

Not yet, I have been experimenting tho. I will attempt one today.
